member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:MilenioApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: M:MilenioApi.Controllers.SeguridadController.LoginEntidad(MilenioApi.Models.LoginModel)
member.summary: Metodo para loguear y retornar el token + los roles
member.remarks:
PARAMETRO: user [STRING]
PARAMETRO: password [STRING]
PARAMETRO: identidad [STRING]
ON ERROR REGRESA LA SIG ESTRUCTURA: {
"errorlist": [
{
"errorlist": [],
"response_code": null,
"custom": null,
"message": "El campo password es obligatorio.",
"name": "password",
"id": null
}
],
"response_code": "03",
"custom": "",
"message": "Login Invalido ",
"name": null,
"id": null
}
member.returns: Regresa el token + los roles asociados a esa entidad seleccionada
